title: OCE Server disconnection????
body: All my friends playing an aram game just disconnected at the same time. Is this happening to everyone else at this time?{{champion:79}} {{summoner:3}} {{summoner:3}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

It seems I'm a bit late to help out on this one, however if there is ever widespread outages/issues there will usually be information on the [Service Status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce) page or a thread made in the [Announcements](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements) board.
